titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to postpone the imposition of the Federal tobacco excise tax with respect to imported, unpackaged tobacco products.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 4/13/1988--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit unpackaged imported tobacco products and cigarette papers and tubes to be released from customs custody for delivery to a manufacturer of such items without payment of the tobacco excise tax.
